main-banner.text: Romeo.AI is an App that helps you to test your model robustness based on generated adversarial samples. this App is supported by a testing toolbox called Deepconcolic which is based on the concolic testing approach.

Deepconcolic is a tool developed for testing and verifying the correctness and robustness of deep neural networks. It combines both concrete and symbolic execution to generate inputs that can reveal the limitations and biases of a trained neural network.
The MNIST database (Modified National Institute of Standards and Technology database) is a large database of handwritten digits that is commonly used for training various image processing systems.

Fashion-MNIST is a dataset of Zalando's article images consisting of a training set of 60,000 examples and a test set of 10,000 examples. Each example is a 28x28 grayscale image, associated with a label from 10 classes.

CIFAR-10  is an established computer-vision dataset used for object recognition. It is a subset of the 80 million tiny images dataset and consists of 60,000 32x32 color images containing one of 10 object classes, with 6000 images per class.

process.paragraph: you are developing an AI model and you want to test its robustness you are at the right place all you have to do is uploading your image classification model in H5 format.
by a few clicks you are ready to test your model. We kindly resquest your confidence. however this task takes time.
Do not worry because we take care of this issue and for that we are poviding an emailing service. Once your report is ready we will send you a notification email.

FQA.question: How can Romeo.ai help me improve my productivity and efficiency?
FQA.response: Romeo.ai can help improve your productivity and efficiency by automating repetitive tasks, providing intelligent data analysis, and offering actionable insights. With its AI-powered capabilities, Romeo.ai can streamline workflows, enhance decision-making processes, and accelerate task completion, ultimately saving you time and effort.

FQA.question: Is Romeo.ai suitable for both beginners and advanced users?
FQA.response: Romeo.ai is designed to be suitable for both beginners and advanced users. Its user-friendly interface and intuitive features make it accessible and easy to use.

FQA.question: How does Romeo.ai ensure data security and privacy?
FQA.response: Romeo.ai ensures data security and privacy through strong encryption protocols, robust access controls, data anonymization practices, compliance with regulations, and regular security audits. These measures protect user data during transmission, limit access to authorized personnel, anonymize personally identifiable information, comply with relevant data protection regulations, and proactively identify and address vulnerabilities to maintain a high level of security.

FQA.question: Can Romeo.ai provide real-time analytics and insights for my data?
FQA.response: Currently, Romeo.ai is still working towards optimizing its solution for real-time analytics and insights. In the current version, the generation of results may take some time, and once they are ready for review, the user is notified via email.

testimonials.name: Jeon Jungkook
testimonials.opinion: I'm impressed with the ease of use and accuracy of Romeo.ai. As a beginner in CNN classification, it has allowed me to test and evaluate my models effortlessly. The availability of pre-trained models on well-known benchmarks like MNIST and CIFAR-10 has been a great learning tool for me. Thank you, Romeo.ai!

testimonials.name: Lee Felix
testimonials.opinion: I've been using Romeo.ai for testing my CNN models, and it has exceeded my expectations. The platform is intuitive, and the insights provided have been invaluable in improving the accuracy of my models. I highly recommend Romeo.ai to anyone in the field.

testimonials.name: AugustD
testimonials.opinion: Romeo.ai has saved us so much time and effort in evaluating our CNN models. The platform's ability to generate results and notify us by email has streamlined our workflow. The performance on benchmarks like Fashion-MNIST has provided us with confidence in our models. It's a fantastic tool for anyone working with CNN classification.
